thread.title: Britain's Rough gas storage site in unplanned outage
thread.title_full: Britain's Rough gas storage site in unplanned outage

title: Britain's Rough gas storage site in unplanned outage
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 31, 2015, 11:56 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 34 mins Britain's Rough gas storage site in unplanned outage Reuters - UK Focus – 1 hour 8 minutes ago -2.5000 
(Adds detail about injection capacity loss) 
LONDON, July 31 (Reuters) - Britain's Rough natural gas storage site is experiencing an unplanned outage on Friday, operator Centrica Storage Limited said. 
Withdrawal capacity has been reduced to zero and injection capacity has been cut by 5 mcm/day due to "essential maintenance" and the end date of the outage is not yet known. 
Rough was already experiencing a partial withdrawal outage due to repairs which are scheduled to last until Sept. 3. 
(Reporting by Nina Chestney; editing by Jason Neely) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
